column5: A few buddies and I went down to LPB in search of some perch and pike. It was the first time ice fishing for 2 of them and even though it was a somewhat slow day they are now hooked.  Sobeys had all there fresh food 50% when I went to get sandwiches and I got a little out of hand    We rented a hut from Sherman's out of St. Williams and their service was top notch. Fresh stock of minnows all day, they were constantly checking to make sure we were good and lots of firewood for the fireplace.      We had good action right off the bat and landed a bunch of keepers      I think it was the nicest days that I have ever spent on the ice. We had our jackets off all day and the sun was WARM!!!          We ended up keeping a dozen for a snack and throwing back a ton of smaller ones. Overall a great day on the ice with friends       Dan
Hey Dan Very Very Jealous that you got out AGAIN.  It was nice to meet you and congrats on your catches
Dan, What does it cost for a day like that (minus the snacks and beer, those I can figure out)? Thanks. Jim

Oh it was   It was great to meet you. If you're ever down this way we should hit the ice or the softwater (as long as you give me back my boat  )   Hey Jim,  It costs $35 per person and parking is $5 at the top of the hill. That gives you the hut, bait, all your holes drilled, firewood and a ride in and out. Shermans and Grangers are both great. Let me know if you want the contact info.
I think that I might have a go at that price. If you could PM me the deatils that would be great Dan. Thanks! Jim
Looks like you all had a blast.

Great report and pics Dan Got to love spending quality time amongst friends and getting into some beauties You weren't kidding when you said it got a little out of hand Man that's a lot of candies Looks like you guys had an awesome time!!! Thanks for sharing Leechman

PM coming   yep, we are booked again in two weeks!   haha i wasn't kidding. If I remember correctly we had 6 subs, 12 donuts, beef samosas, sushi, chicken chow mein, sweet and sour chicken, chicken fried rice, turkey sandwiches, soft tacos, cherry turnovers, chips, pepperonis and granola bars   I'm still full!!!
